name: Squiggly: Unleashed
description:
Created for the 2020 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam.

A Giant Monster has gotten loose! Keep him from eating your allies by distracting him with food and lead him toward your enemies.

Controls:

- Click to place pieces of food

- Hold Right Mouse Button to move camera

- Scroll Wheel to Zoom

------------------Credits--------------------
